alert.note: Alert for Madison; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 10:01AM CST until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River Near Bentonia affecting Madison and Yazoo Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River Near Bentonia. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Low lying woodland areas along the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 18.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Wednesday morning and continue rising to 22.5 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Big Black River Bentonia 22.0 18.3 Fri 9 am CST 19.7 20.4 21.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 7 PM CST.
